properties.name: docker.postgres.enabled
properties.description: Determines whether the Postgres Docker image is enabled. Default is false.

properties.name: docker.postgres.stdOutFilename
properties.description: The file for the OS process to write its std output to. Default is 'docker-std-out.log'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.stdErrFilename
properties.description: The file for the OS process to write its std output to. Default is 'docker-std-err.log'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.password
properties.description: Postgres password to use. Default is 'postgres'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.port
properties.description: Port for Postgres to run on. Default is '5432'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.imageName
properties.description: Name of the Docker image to use. Default is 'postgres'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.imageVersion
properties.description: Version of the Docker image to use. Default is 'latest'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.timeout
properties.description: The duration in milliseconds which will be slept (ie, Thread.sleep) before the process is halted. Default is 300000 (ie, 5 minutes)

properties.name: docker.postgres.containerName
properties.description: Name for the container to launch under. Default is 'postgression'.

properties.name: docker.postgres.startupVerificationText
properties.description: Text which will be looked to indicate the Docker container has started successfully. Default is 'PostgreSQL init process complete; ready for start up.'.
